Posts.Content:
Thanks Bev, as I'm sure you know this has been all consuming for me. Being able to put it in words has helped tremendously and I am grateful that this site is here. Appointment is this afternoon, pathologist is on site, so I should have results today also. 
Thanks again for the reply and well wishes. Ill post results later.
Posts.Title: anxious

Posts.Content: I had a routine mammogram/ultrasound yesterday and they found a solid hypoechoic mass measuring 6X6X4 mm with slightly irregular margins in the 9:00 periareolar right breast. Anyone have any experience/knowledge? I am having an ultrasound guided biopsy tomorrow and am a nervous wreck.
Posts.Title: anxious

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for your post. I had a core biopsy, the pathologist was in the room and didn't find anything abnormal. Lab results will be back in a few days. Keeping positive thoughts.
Posts.Title: anxious
